item.title: By: conor
item.dc:creator: conor
item.description: Paul, new URLs now in place and the old ones will redirect to them correctly.
item.content:encoded: Paul, new URLs now in place and the old ones will redirect to them correctly.

item.title: By: Conor O'Neill
item.dc:creator: Conor O'Neill
item.description:
Paul, it won't break existing posts but it will break any links on other blogs to existing posts, which is a concern.
I prefer the date/name permalink approach too. I'll see what the consensus from the admins is.
item.content:encoded:
Paul, it won’t break existing posts but it will break any links on other blogs to existing posts, which is a concern.

I prefer the date/name permalink approach too. I’ll see what the consensus from the admins is.

item.title: By: Paul Walsh
item.dc:creator: Paul Walsh
item.description: ... sorry I should have added that I'm an author (as you know) but don't have access to the .htaccess file.
item.content:encoded: … sorry I should have added that I’m an author (as you know) but don’t have access to the .htaccess file.

item.title: By: Paul Walsh
item.dc:creator: Paul Walsh
item.description: Conor, can setup meaningful permalinks? Fergus said this would break previous posts but I'm not sure it will. You can do this by adding /blog/%postname%/ to the custom field.
item.content:encoded: Conor, can setup meaningful permalinks? Fergus said this would break previous posts but I’m not sure it will. You can do this by adding /blog/%postname%/ to the custom field.
